string-array.name: question
string-array.item: Which of the following is not a programming language? ,Java,PHP,Python,Html,Html
Which of the following is not a RDBMS? ,MS,SQL,Oracle,MongoDB,MySql,MongoDB
Which of the following is not an OS? ,Windows,Linux,Ubuntu,Word,Word
Which of the following is not a country? ,Nepal,India,China,Kanpur,Kanpur
What is the height of Mount Everest? ,8848 metres,8849 metres,8847 metres,8088 metres,8848 metres
